description: This skill returns wind speed data from the Chesapeake Bay Interpretive Buoy System specifically designed for sailing community. Ask this skill "How windy is it in Annapolis" or "For the wind speed in Potomac".
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask sailing forecast for the sailing forecast in Annapolis
Alexa ask sailing forecast for the wind speed in Potomac
name: Sailing Forecast
shortDescription: This skill returns wind speed data from the Chesapeake Bay Interpretive Buoy System specifically designed for sailing community.
